custom-sql.sql: SELECT categoryid as masterdataid ,'C-'||categoryid as referenceid, value as value FROM category;
SELECT subid as masterdataid , subcategoryvalue as value , 'SC-'||subid as referenceid FROM subcategory where categoryid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid ,'C-'||typeid as referenceid, typevalue as value FROM type;
SELECT modeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||modeid as referenceid, modevalue as value FROM deliverymode;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid, filecodevalue as value FROM filecode;
SELECT basicheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheadid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value FROM basichead;
SELECT primaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value FROM primaryhead where basicheadid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value FROM secondaryhead where primaryheadid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheadid as referenceid , teritaryheadvalue as value FROM teritaryhead where secondaryheadid = ?;
SELECT organizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value FROM organization ;
SELECT suborganizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationid as referenceid , suborganizationvalue as value FROM suborganization where organizationid = ?;
SELECT receiptid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptid as referenceid , receiptvalue as value FROM receiptcategory;
SELECT receiptsubcategoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryid as referenceid , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value FROM receiptsubcategory where receiptcategoryid = ?;
